actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-335.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 398 - 4 (Record Vote No: 314).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4995) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4995 (Department of Defense funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4995) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, and for other purposes.
